verbs.description: I [V: happened] [ARG1: to be awake when Trump ’s North Korea news conference was starting] . His prepared remarks and his answers to questions has been typical Trump : outrages , nonsensical , embarrassing , funny at times for the wrong reasons , enraging , etc . ...
